nodes.excerpt: Compose private notes, optionally share them with others and still stay in control of who can access your data. All while having an excellent offline-first experience on all platforms.
nodes.title: Serenity Notes - End-to-end encrypted collaborative notes app
nodes.author: Moritz Plassnig

localize.description: 撰写私人笔记，有选择地与他人分享，并且仍然可以控制谁可以访问你的数据。同时在所有平台上都能获得出色的离线优先体验。
localize.tagline: 端到端加密的协作笔记应用。

localize.description: 撰寫私人筆記，有選擇地與他人分享，並且仍然可以控制誰可以訪問你的數據。同時在所有平臺上都能獲得出色的離線優先體驗。
localize.tagline: 端到端加密的協作筆記應用。

nodes.excerpt: Porter is a platform that makes AWS/GCP as easy to use as Heroku. With instant deploys from Git, built-in autoscaling, and automatic SSL, Porter gives you the convenience of a PaaS while preserving flexibility and control.
nodes.title: Porter - Heroku that runs in your own cloud
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Porter是一个让AWS/GCP像Heroku一样容易使用的平台。通过Git的即时部署、内置自动缩放和自动SSL，Porter为您提供了PaaS的便利，同时保留了灵活性和控制力。
localize.tagline: 运行在自己云端的Heroku

localize.description: Porter是一個讓AWS/GCP像Heroku一樣容易使用的平臺。通過Git的即時部署、內置自動縮放和自動SSL，Porter爲您提供了PaaS的便利，同時保留了靈活性和控制力。
localize.tagline: 運行在自己雲端的Heroku

nodes.excerpt: Start creating your app with clean mind and clear representing of screen structure. There are 12 device mockups in the pack, for both iPhone and Android. Carefully created A4 format templates that perfectly repeat the real device sizes. PNG, JPG, PDF formats.
nodes.title: Printables - Free printable templates for your mobile sketching
nodes.author: Vitaly Belousov

localize.description: 以简洁的思维和清晰的画面结构开始创建你的应用程序。套件中共有12个设备模拟图，适用于iPhone和Android。精心制作的A4格式模板，完美地重复了真实设备的尺寸。PNG, JPG, PDF格式。
localize.tagline: 免费打印模板，为您的手机画草图服务

localize.description: 以簡潔的思維和清晰的畫面結構開始創建你的應用程序。套件中共有12個設備模擬圖，適用於iPhone和Android。精心製作的A4格式模板，完美地重複了真實設備的尺寸。PNG, JPG, PDF格式。
localize.tagline: 免費打印模板，爲您的手機畫草圖服務

nodes.excerpt: Instantly find the "best fit" VC funds for your startup. OpenVC lets you browse 2,200+ funds by investment criteria. In return, VCs receive less spam and more qualified deal flow. Let's build an open way into VC!
nodes.title: OpenVC - 2200+ VC firms by thesis to find 'best fit' for your startup
nodes.author: Steph Nass

localize.description: 即时找到 "最适合 "你的创业公司的风险投资基金。OpenVC可以让您按投资标准浏览2200多个基金。作为回报，VC收到的垃圾信息更少，合格的交易流更多。让我们建立一个开放的方式进入VC!
localize.tagline: 2200+家风投公司按论文分类，为你的创业公司找到 "最适合"。

localize.description: 即時找到 "最適合 "你的創業公司的風險投資基金。OpenVC可以讓您按投資標準瀏覽2200多個基金。作爲回報，VC收到的垃圾信息更少，合格的交易流更多。讓我們建立一個開放的方式進入VC!
localize.tagline: 2200+家風投公司按論文分類，爲你的創業公司找到 "最適合"。

nodes.excerpt: Webiny is an open-source framework that helps developers architect, build and deploy applications on top of the serverless infrastructure. Webiny also comes with a serverless CMS that runs on top of AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, and S3.
nodes.title: Webiny 5.0 - Build serverless applications and websites in minutes
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: Webiny是一个开源框架，可以帮助开发者在无服务器基础设施之上架构、构建和部署应用。Webiny还附带了一个无服务器CMS，运行在AWS Lambda、DynamoDB和S3之上。
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内构建无服务器应用程序和网站

localize.description: Webiny是一個開源框架，可以幫助開發者在無服務器基礎設施之上架構、構建和部署應用。Webiny還附帶了一個無服務器CMS，運行在AWS Lambda、DynamoDB和S3之上。
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內構建無服務器應用程序和網站

nodes.excerpt: Formst is a JavaScript library for structuring and validating forms in React. It is based on MobX-State-Tree which makes it simple and performant and it is built on the principles of "UI as an afterthought".
nodes.title: Formst - Model-driven form library for React
nodes.author: Gaurav Guha

localize.description: Formst是一个用于在React中构建和验证表单的JavaScript库。它基于MobX-St-state-Tree，使得它简单且性能良好，它是建立在 "UI作为事后考虑 "的原则上。
localize.tagline: 模型驱动的React表单库

localize.description: Formst是一個用於在React中構建和驗證表單的JavaScript庫。它基於MobX-St-state-Tree，使得它簡單且性能良好，它是建立在 "UI作爲事後考慮 "的原則上。
localize.tagline: 模型驅動的React表單庫

nodes.excerpt: Amplication is an open source development tool. It helps you develop quality Node.js applications without spending time on repetitive coding tasks.
nodes.title: Amplication - Instantly generate Node.js apps with GraphQL and REST API
nodes.author: Ben Lang

localize.description: Amplication是一个开源的开发工具。它可以帮助你开发高质量的Node.js应用，而无需花费时间在重复的编码任务上。
localize.tagline: 使用GraphQL和REST API即时生成Node.js应用。

localize.description: Amplication是一個開源的開發工具。它可以幫助你開發高質量的Node.js應用，而無需花費時間在重複的編碼任務上。
localize.tagline: 使用GraphQL和REST API即時生成Node.js應用。

nodes.excerpt: Devcover is an open-source application that allows developers to create and deploy their portfolio in less than 5 minutes with just their username. Features - Good designed - Google Analytics support - SEO friendly - Mobile friendly - Fully customizable - High performance - Availability to be hired - And much more...
nodes.title: Devcover - Easiest way to generate a developer portfolio
nodes.author: Junior Garcia

localize.description: Devcover是一个开源的应用程序，它允许开发人员在不到5分钟的时间内，只用他们的用户名来创建和部署他们的投资组合。特点--设计良好--支持谷歌分析--SEO友好--移动友好--完全可定制--高性能--可被雇佣--还有更多... ...
localize.tagline: 生成开发者投资组合的最简单方法

localize.description: Devcover是一個開源的應用程序，它允許開發人員在不到5分鐘的時間內，只用他們的用戶名來創建和部署他們的投資組合。特點--設計良好--支持谷歌分析--SEO友好--移動友好--完全可定製--高性能--可被僱傭--還有更多... ...
localize.tagline: 生成開發者投資組合的最簡單方法

nodes.excerpt: Lullaby helps treat Tinnitus, a condition that makes you hear a very annoying sound for the rest of your life. Most of the ENTs I checked with seemed poorly prepared to help their patients with the stress, so the app teaches you a healthy way to do that.
nodes.title: Lullaby - Helps you treat Tinnitus, a chronic health condition
nodes.author: Roberto González

localize.description: 摇篮曲有助于治疗耳鸣，这是一种让你在余生中听到非常恼人的声音的情况。我检查过的大多数耳鼻喉科医生似乎都没有准备好帮助他们的病人解决压力，所以这个应用程序教你一个健康的方法。
localize.tagline: 帮助您治疗慢性病--耳鸣。

localize.description: 搖籃曲有助於治療耳鳴，這是一種讓你在餘生中聽到非常惱人的聲音的情況。我檢查過的大多數耳鼻喉科醫生似乎都沒有準備好幫助他們的病人解決壓力，所以這個應用程序教你一個健康的方法。
localize.tagline: 幫助您治療慢性病--耳鳴。

nodes.excerpt: Web Analytics made simple and therefore privacy friendly. No Cookies. No logging. No IP address fingerprinting. We don't collect personal data, which allows serving many users with little hosting costs. The source code is published under the AGPL‑v3 licence.
nodes.title: Counter - Simple and free web analytics
nodes.author: Bogdan Slomchinskiy

localize.description: 网络分析变得简单，因此对隐私友好。没有Cookies。没有记录。没有IP地址指纹。我们不收集个人数据，这允许以较少的托管成本为许多用户服务。源代码是在AGPL-v3许可下发布的。
localize.tagline: 简单而免费的网络分析

localize.description: 網絡分析變得簡單，因此對隱私友好。沒有Cookies。沒有記錄。沒有IP地址指紋。我們不收集個人數據，這允許以較少的託管成本爲許多用戶服務。源代碼是在AGPL-v3許可下發布的。
localize.tagline: 簡單而免費的網絡分析

nodes.excerpt: Our next generation of Flutter, built for web, mobile, and desktop Today, Google's announcing Flutter 2: a major upgrade to Flutter that enables developers to create beautiful, fast, and portable apps for any platform.

nodes.excerpt: Sprint Poker is an intuitive, lightweight estimation tool that fits into your existing Jira workflow. 🗳️ Estimates that sync back to Jira automagically 🃏 Interactive cards and custom estimation scales ⏰ Async friendly for distributed teams
nodes.title: Sprint Poker by Parabol - Remotely bring planning poker to life
nodes.author: Jordan Husney

localize.description: Sprint Poker是一个直观的，轻量级的估算工具，适合你现有的Jira工作流程。🗳️ 估算可以自动同步回Jira 🃏 交互式卡片和自定义估算尺度 ⏰ 对分布式团队的同步友好。
localize.tagline: 远程将规划扑克带入生活

nodes.excerpt: Athens is an open-source and local-first alternative to Roam Research. Athens is the most powerful and transparent knowledge graph.
nodes.title: Athens Research - Open-source, local-first Roam Research
nodes.author: Jeff Tang

localize.description: Athens是Roam Research的一个开源和本地优先选择。Athens是最强大、最透明的知识图谱。

nodes.excerpt: Global.health is a collaborative effort by technologists and researchers from leading international institutions to build a trusted, detailed, and accurate resource of real-time infectious disease data.
nodes.title: Global.health - Access data about 5M+ anonymized COVID-19 cases
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Global.health是来自主要国际机构的技术专家和研究人员的合作努力，旨在建立一个值得信赖、详细、准确的实时传染病数据资源。
localize.tagline: 获取500万+匿名的COVID-19案例的数据

localize.description: Global.health是來自主要國際機構的技術專家和研究人員的合作努力，旨在建立一個值得信賴、詳細、準確的實時傳染病數據資源。
localize.tagline: 獲取500萬+匿名的COVID-19案例的數據

nodes.excerpt: SigNoz is an open-source alternative to DataDog. We help developers find issues in the software they run on cloud and solve them quickly. Run SigNoz in your infrastructure and get your application monitoring setup at 10x lower cost
nodes.title: SigNoz - Open source alternative to Datadog
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: SigNoz是DataDog的开源替代产品。我们帮助开发人员发现他们在云上运行的软件中的问题，并快速解决这些问题。在您的基础架构中运行SigNoz，并以10倍的成本获得您的应用程序监控设置。
localize.tagline: Datadog的开源替代品

localize.description: SigNoz是DataDog的開源替代產品。我們幫助開發人員發現他們在雲上運行的軟件中的問題，並快速解決這些問題。在您的基礎架構中運行SigNoz，並以10倍的成本獲得您的應用程序監控設置。
localize.tagline: Datadog的開源替代品

nodes.excerpt: Hasura helps developers and organisations build and ship modern applications & APIs faster by making data instantly accessible over a realtime GraphQL & REST APIs.
nodes.title: Hasura GraphQL Engine 2.0 - Instant realtime GraphQL for all your data
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Hasura通过实时的GraphQL和REST API使数据可即时访问，帮助开发者和组织更快地构建和发布现代应用程序和API。
localize.tagline: 为您的所有数据提供即时的实时GraphQL

localize.description: Hasura通過實時的GraphQL和REST API使數據可即時訪問，幫助開發者和組織更快地構建和發佈現代應用程序和API。
localize.tagline: 爲您的所有數據提供即時的實時GraphQL

nodes.excerpt: Chatwoot is an open-source omnichannel communication platform built as an alternative to Intercom, Zendesk etc. Chatwoot helps you to connect email, website live chat, social media handles, WhatsApp etc. and manage all your customer interactions from one place.
nodes.title: Chatwoot - Open-source customer communication platform
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Chatwoot是一个开源的全渠道沟通平台，作为Intercom、Zendesk等的替代品。Chatwoot可以帮助你连接电子邮件、网站即时聊天、社交媒体手柄、WhatsApp等，从一个地方管理所有的客户互动。
localize.tagline: 开源客户沟通平台

localize.description: Chatwoot是一個開源的全渠道溝通平臺，作爲Intercom、Zendesk等的替代品。Chatwoot可以幫助你連接電子郵件、網站即時聊天、社交媒體手柄、WhatsApp等，從一個地方管理所有的客戶互動。
localize.tagline: 開源客戶溝通平臺

nodes.excerpt: React Native ARIA provides a set of React hooks that handles behaviour, accessibility and interactions so you can implement custom components and design systems for Android, iOS and Web.
nodes.title: React Native ARIA - React Hooks to make accessible React Native design systems
nodes.author: Gaurav Guha

localize.description: React Native ARIA提供了一套处理行为、可访问性和交互的React钩子，因此你可以为Android、iOS和Web实现自定义组件和设计系统。
localize.tagline: React Hooks让React Native设计系统无障碍化

localize.description: React Native ARIA提供了一套處理行爲、可訪問性和交互的React鉤子，因此你可以爲Android、iOS和Web實現自定義組件和設計系統。
localize.tagline: React Hooks讓React Native設計系統無障礙化

localize.tagline: 在您的無服務器應用程序上實時工作

nodes.excerpt: Decentraland is a decentralized virtual reality platform powered by the Ethereum blockchain. Within the Decentraland platform, users can create, experience, and monetize their content and applications.
nodes.title: Decentraland 2.0 - Explore a virtual world owned by its users
nodes.author: Sam Drozdov

localize.description: Decentraland是一个由Ethereum区块链驱动的去中心化虚拟现实平台。在Decentraland平台内，用户可以创建、体验和货币化他们的内容和应用。
localize.tagline: 探索一个属于用户的虚拟世界

localize.description: Decentraland是一個由Ethereum區塊鏈驅動的去中心化虛擬現實平臺。在Decentraland平臺內，用戶可以創建、體驗和貨幣化他們的內容和應用。
localize.tagline: 探索一個屬於用戶的虛擬世界

nodes.excerpt: Papercups is an open-source live customer chat app written in Elixir. We are a dev friendly alternative to Intercom and Drift that is highly extensible and customizable. We also have a Slack integration that lets you reply from Slack.
nodes.title: Papercups 2.0 - Open source Intercom and Drift alternative
nodes.author: Kam Leung

localize.description: Papercups 是一个用 Elixir 编写的开源即时客户聊天应用。我们是 Intercom 和 Drift 的友好替代品，具有高度的可扩展性和可定制性。我们还集成了Slack，让您可以在Slack上进行回复。
localize.tagline: 开源的Intercom和Drift替代品

localize.description: Papercups 是一個用 Elixir 編寫的開源即時客戶聊天應用。我們是 Intercom 和 Drift 的友好替代品，具有高度的可擴展性和可定製性。我們還集成了Slack，讓您可以在Slack上進行回覆。
localize.tagline: 開源的Intercom和Drift替代品

nodes.excerpt: Our serverless Kubernetes platform is designed for the needs of fast moving development teams who want to focus on delivering applications, not operations.
nodes.title: CTO.ai 2.0 - A smarter workflow for Cloud Native apps
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: 我们的无服务器Kubernetes平台是为了满足快速发展的开发团队的需求而设计的，他们希望专注于交付应用程序，而不是操作。

nodes.excerpt: 🍞 Jam is an open source implementation of audio spaces (think: Clubhouse, Twitter Spaces, Orbit, …). Jam lets you can create rooms that can be used for panel discussions, jam sessions, free flowing conversations, debates, theatre plays, musicals and more.
nodes.title: Jam - Your own version of Clubhouse for mini conferences & friends
nodes.author: Thomas Schranz ⛄️

localize.description: 🍞 Jam是一个开源的音频空间实现（想想看：Clubhouse，Twitter Spaces，Orbit，...）。Jam让你可以创建可用于小组讨论、果酱会议、自由流动的对话、辩论、戏剧、音乐剧等的房间。
localize.tagline: 您自己的小型会议和朋友聚会的会所版本。

localize.description: 🍞 Jam是一個開源的音頻空間實現（想想看：Clubhouse，Twitter Spaces，Orbit，...）。Jam讓你可以創建可用於小組討論、果醬會議、自由流動的對話、辯論、戲劇、音樂劇等的房間。
localize.tagline: 您自己的小型會議和朋友聚會的會所版本。
